[7] These data suggest that increased transport of glutamine into the H. pylori cell and subsequent metabolic breakdown of this to produce ammonia may be important mechanisms employed by the bacteria to facilitate survival. [1] Another pathway involved in the production of ammonia is also up regulated in the presence of acidic pH.
